roleset.name: have, own

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Iran , which was implicitly reminded not to interfere in the affairs of Iraq , was explicitly mentioned with the expression of Gulf concerns for its possession of nuclear programs .

example.name: Arg0 only, as question word
example.text: ...after the arrest of the first person in whose possession were ten pills of the same kind that were seized...

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb possess.01, VN class own-100. Framed by Claire.
